TextView.android:text: Gomoku, is a traditional, two-player, board game. Each player must place their respective colored pieces on the board. The objective of the game is to get 5 piece in a row.

Power-Ups: To make the game more interesting, power-ups are awarded randomly throughout the game. There are two power-ups: extra turn and grey piece. The extra turn power-up, gives the user that received the power up an extra turn to place another piece on the board. The grey piece power-up allows the user to place the grey piece anywhere on the board, including on top of another piece. This allows the user to ‘nullify’ a piece on the board that might have a potential 4-in-a-row. For example, if a grey piece is placed between on the 2nd piece of a four-in-a-row, the new outcome is a one and a two in a row, effectively splitting up the four-in-a-row.
This game was created by Amit, Gina, and Jay
